name: aerofly RC 10 - RC Flight Simulator
description:
Fly fantastic RC models with this model flight simulator on your PC monitor or stand directly on the runway of the 4D scenery in VR mode. aerofly RC 10 is the first choice for beginners, amateurs and professionals when it comes to learning and improving model flying. The extremely realistic flight physics, fantastic graphics and the option with a VR headset always give you the feeling of being right on the field.

Training with the aerofly RC 10 prepares you perfectly for flying model airplanes and also offers incredible fun! Practice air racing, limbo flying, balloon piercing and hovering with the Helitrainer, aerobatics with the Torquetrainer, face landing contests, dynamic soaring, pylon racing, drone racing, enjoy slope flying with gliders, fly in chase view through the 4D scenery and much more.

Choose from many different model types: Aerobatic models, helicopters, multi-copters, jets, gliders, scale models, indoor models, float-planes and even true scale (1:1) aircraft.

Aerofly RC 10 comes with 105 models and 22 sceneries by default. You can expand aerofly RC 10 at any time by getting one of the expansion packs that each feature 100 new models and 20 new sceneries!

FEATURES

  • Choose from over 64 models and 15 sceneries (incl. 4D scenery for VR mode).
  • Incredibly detailed sceneries with full HD display support (monitor).
  • Full VR support (HTC Vive, OCULUS, Windows Mixed Reality).
  • Extremely detailed models with realistic flight physics.
  • Set wind and time of day for optimal training conditions.
  • Many different model types: Aerobatic models, helicopters, multicopters, jets, gliders, scale models, indoor models, float-planes and true-scale models
  • Support for many USB R/C controllers, USB joysticks and game controllers
  • Fly with aerofly RC 10 friends around the world in multiplayer mode, compatible to previous aerofly RC versions
  • Fly together on the same computer with the Split-Screen feature.
  • Winch-Launch, Hand-Launch, Glider-Towing
  • Torque-roll and helicopter hover trainers
  • Fun contests such as air-race, pylon-race, drone-race, limbo, balloon piercing, spot-landing, dynamic soaring as well as speed, distance and duration tasks

NOTE: Many of the models (especially helicopters) cannot be controlled reasonably with joystick that has less than 4 axes. Visit our official website for a list of supported input devices or optional hardware to connect your own transmitter.
